titles.title: Everyone That Thirsteth, Come Ye To The Waters

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Everyone that thirsteth, Come ye to the waters He that hath no money, come ye and buy Come and buy and eat, Yea come without your money God will give you plenty And all your need supply.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why do you spend your money For things you do not need And labor for the things which never satisfy? If your soul is hungry, The Bread of Life He’ll give you The Lord will fill your cup and grace He’ll multiply. Ho!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come unto the Savior, listen to His voice Hear Him with your heart and your soul shall live God the Father promised an everlasting covenant Righteousness and mercy He will surely give. Ho!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Seek ye the Lord while He may be found Call upon His name while the Savior’s near He will surely answer, abundantly He’ll pardon He will give you joy and take away your fear. Ho!{/lang-eng}
